books.title: Cat in the Hat
books.text: The sun did not shine. It was too wet to play. So we sat in the house all that cold, cold, wet day.

books.title: Go Dog Go
books.text: Two dogs at play, at play up on top. Go, dogs. Go! Do not play up there. Go down.

books.title: War and Peace
books.text: Prussia has always declared that Buonaparte is invincible and that all Europe is powerless before him. . . . And I don't believe a word that Hardenburg says, or Haugwitz either.
